                              :ARG0 (t / this)

                                          :ARG0-of (s2 / specialize-01))
                                    :ARG1 t))))
            :ARG2 p
            :mod (h / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (c2 / check-01
                  :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                  :ARG1 (h2 / history

            :op2 (r3 / revert-01

                  :ARG1 (r4 / resolution)

      :snt3 (p3 / person

            :op1 "Akhilesh"
